Package org.jvault.factory

Interface VaultFactory<T>

Type Parameters:
T - Type of vault to be created.
All Known Implementing Classes:
TypeVaultFactory
@API public interface VaultFactory<T>
Receives the VaultFactoryBuildInfo or String (the name of the Vault if the Vault already exists) value as an input, and returns the Vault.
Since:
0.1
See Also:
  • Vault
  • VaultFactoryBuildInfo

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    <R extends Vault<?>>
    R
    get(String vaultName, T param)
    Returns the Vault interface implementation by receiving the vaultName and param(type of vault)
    This method is not to create a new vault, but to return the existing vault corresponding to the vaultName.
    <R extends Vault<?>>
    R
    get(VaultFactoryBuildInfo buildInfo, T param)
    Returns the Vault interface implementation class by receiving the VaultFactoryBuildInfo and param(type of vault)
    Vault Factory creates a new Vault based on VaultFactoryInfo.

  • Method Details

    • get

      <R extends Vault<?>> R get(String vaultName, T param) throws IllegalStateException
      Returns the Vault interface implementation by receiving the vaultName and param(type of vault)
      This method is not to create a new vault, but to return the existing vault corresponding to the vaultName.
      If none of the vault matched with vaultName, throw IllegalStateException.
      Type Parameters:
      R - The implementation of Vault.
      Parameters:
      vaultName - The name of the vault to be returned.
      param - Type of vault to be created.
      Returns:
      R The implementation type of the Vault

      interface.

      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - Throw IllegalStateException if the corresponding vault does not exist for the vaultName.
      Since:
      0.1

    • get

      <R extends Vault<?>> R get(VaultFactoryBuildInfo buildInfo, T param)
      Returns the Vault interface implementation class by receiving the VaultFactoryBuildInfo and param(type of vault)
      Vault Factory creates a new Vault based on VaultFactoryInfo.
      If a vault with the name corresponding to "VaultFactoryBuildInfo.getVaultName()" already exists, the vault is returned.
      Type Parameters:
      R - The implementation of Vault.
      Parameters:
      buildInfo - The collection of information that VaultFactory needs to create Vault.
      param - Type of vault to be created.
      Returns:
      R The implementation type of the Vault

      interface.

      Since:
      0.1
      See Also:
      • VaultFactoryBuildInfo
